mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'
AND MS_NAME LIKE CONCAT(#{searchTxt}, '%')
AND MS_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{searchTxt}, '%')

/* memberMapper.selectLoginUser - 아이디/비밀번호로 회원정보 조회 (로그인) */ SELECT MS_NUM , MS_STATUS , MS_BK_GRANT , MS_DIVISION , MS_LEVEL , MS_LOGIN_CD , MS_LINK , MS_ID , MS_PASSWORD , MS_NAME , MS_ENAME , MS_NICKNAME , MS_IMAGENAME , MS_SEX , DATE_FORMAT(MS_BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MS_BIRTH , MS_BIRTHYL , MS_FIRST_PHONE1 , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO') AS MS_MID_PHONE1 , MS_LAST_PHONE1 , SMS_CHK1 , MS_BLANK , MS_VOUCHER_DAY , MS_WEDDINGDAY , MS_WEDDING , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_EMAIL), 'YIDO') AS MS_EMAIL , MS_EMAIL_YN , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_HOMETEL , MS_HOMEZIP , MS_HOMEADDR1 , MS_HOMEADDR2 , MS_POST_YN , MS_COMPNM , MS_COMPNO , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPTEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPTEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPFAX), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPFAX , MS_COMPZIP , MS_COMPADDR1 , MS_COMPADDR2 , MS_COMP_POST_YN , MS_COMPDEPT , MS_COMPPOSITION , MS_REGDAY , MS_ENDDAY , MS_REMARK , MS_MKT_AGREE_YN , MS_DORMANT , LOGIN_TIME , MS_DI , MS_JOB_CD , MS_AREA1 , MS_AREA2 , MS_PUSH_KEY , MS_ORDER , INPUT_STAFF , INPUT_DATETIME , INPUT_IP , UPDATE_STAFF , UPDATE_DATETIME , UPDATE_IP FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_ID = #{msId} AND MS_PASSWORD = SHA2(#{msPassword}, 256) AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'

/* memberMapper.selectSessionLoginUser - 세션키로 조회 (자동 로그인) */ SELECT MS_NUM , MS_STATUS , MS_BK_GRANT , MS_DIVISION , MS_LEVEL , MS_LOGIN_CD , MS_SESSION_KEY , MS_SESSION_LIMIT , MS_LINK , MS_ID , MS_PASSWORD , MS_NAME , MS_ENAME , MS_NICKNAME , MS_IMAGENAME , MS_SEX , DATE_FORMAT(MS_BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MS_BIRTH , MS_BIRTHYL , MS_FIRST_PHONE1 , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO') AS MS_MID_PHONE1 , MS_LAST_PHONE1 , SMS_CHK1 , MS_BLANK , MS_VOUCHER_DAY , MS_WEDDINGDAY , MS_WEDDING , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_EMAIL), 'YIDO') AS MS_EMAIL , MS_EMAIL_YN , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_HOMETEL , MS_HOMEZIP , MS_HOMEADDR1 , MS_HOMEADDR2 , MS_POST_YN , MS_COMPNM , MS_COMPNO , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPTEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPTEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPFAX), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPFAX , MS_COMPZIP , MS_COMPADDR1 , MS_COMPADDR2 , MS_COMP_POST_YN , MS_COMPDEPT , MS_COMPPOSITION , MS_REGDAY , MS_ENDDAY , MS_REMARK , MS_MKT_AGREE_YN , MS_DORMANT , LOGIN_TIME , MS_DI , MS_JOB_CD , MS_AREA1 , MS_AREA2 , MS_PUSH_KEY , MS_ORDER , INPUT_STAFF , INPUT_DATETIME , INPUT_IP , UPDATE_STAFF , UPDATE_DATETIME , UPDATE_IP FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_SESSION_KEY = #{msSessionKey} AND MS_SESSION_LIMIT > NOW() AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'
/* memberMapper.checkSocialId - MS_PHONE으로 소셜 가입 여부 조회 */ SELECT * FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_ID = #{msId} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' LIMIT 1

/* memberMapper.selectMsSession - MS_NUM으로 회원정보 조회 (세션에 적용) */ SELECT MS_NUM , MS_STATUS , MS_BK_GRANT , MS_DIVISION , MS_LEVEL , MS_LOGIN_CD , MS_LINK , MS_ID , MS_PASSWORD , MS_NAME , MS_ENAME , MS_NICKNAME , MS_IMAGENAME , MS_SEX , DATE_FORMAT(MS_BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MS_BIRTH , MS_BIRTHYL , MS_FIRST_PHONE1 , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO') AS MS_MID_PHONE1 , MS_LAST_PHONE1 , SMS_CHK1 , MS_BLANK , MS_VOUCHER_DAY , MS_WEDDINGDAY , MS_WEDDING , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_EMAIL), 'YIDO') AS MS_EMAIL , MS_EMAIL_YN , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_HOMETEL , MS_HOMEZIP , MS_HOMEADDR1 , MS_HOMEADDR2 , MS_POST_YN , MS_COMPNM , MS_COMPNO , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPTEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPTEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPFAX), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPFAX , MS_COMPZIP , MS_COMPADDR1 , MS_COMPADDR2 , MS_COMP_POST_YN , MS_COMPDEPT , MS_COMPPOSITION , MS_REGDAY , MS_ENDDAY , MS_REMARK , MS_MKT_AGREE_YN , MS_DORMANT , LOGIN_TIME , MS_DI , MS_JOB_CD , MS_AREA1 , MS_AREA2 , MS_PUSH_KEY , MS_ORDER , INPUT_STAFF , INPUT_DATETIME , INPUT_IP , UPDATE_STAFF , UPDATE_DATETIME , UPDATE_IP FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE MS_NUM = #{msNum} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' LIMIT 1

/* memberMapper.selectMemberBasic - 회원 추가정보 조회 (DR_MS_BASIC) */ SELECT MS_NUM , MS_HANDCAP , MS_LESSON_EXP_YN , MS_LESSON_MINUTE , MS_LESSON_TREM , MS_LESSON_UNIT , MS_ROUND_CNT , MS_ROUND_UNIT FROM DR_MS_BASIC A LEFT OUTER JOIN CD_COMMON B ON B.CD_CODE = MS_LESSON_UNIT AND B.CD_DIVISION = '029' LEFT OUTER JOIN CD_COMMON C ON C.CD_CODE = MS_ROUND_UNIT AND C.CD_DIVISION = '029' WHERE MS_NUM = #{msNum}
/* memberMapper.selectMemberCarList - 회원 차량정보 조회 (DR_MS_CAR) */ SELECT CAR_SEQ , MS_NUM , MS_CAR_NO , MS_CAR_KIND FROM DR_MS_CAR WHERE MS_NUM = #{msNum} ORDER BY CAR_SEQ ASC
mapper.delete: /* memberMapper.deleteMemberCar - 회원 차량정보 삭제 (DR_MS_CAR) */ DELETE FROM DR_MS_CAR WHERE MS_NUM = #{msNum}
mapper.select: SELECT MS_BK_GRANT FROM DR_MS_MAININFO WHERE MS_ID = #{msId} AND IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N'

/* memberMapper.selectProList - 프로 목록 조회 (DR_MS_MAININFO) */ SELECT A.MS_NUM , MS_STATUS , MS_BK_GRANT , MS_DIVISION , MS_LEVEL , MS_LOGIN_CD , MS_LINK , MS_ID , MS_NAME , MS_ENAME , MS_NICKNAME , MS_IMAGENAME , MS_SEX , DATE_FORMAT(MS_BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MS_BIRTH , MS_BIRTHYL , MS_FIRST_PHONE1 , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO') AS MS_MID_PHONE1 , MS_LAST_PHONE1 , SMS_CHK1 , MS_BLANK , MS_VOUCHER_DAY , MS_WEDDINGDAY , MS_WEDDING , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_EMAIL), 'YIDO') AS MS_EMAIL , MS_EMAIL_YN , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_HOMETEL , MS_HOMEZIP , MS_HOMEADDR1 , MS_HOMEADDR2 , MS_POST_YN , MS_COMPNM , MS_COMPNO , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPTEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPTEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPFAX), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPFAX , MS_COMPZIP , MS_COMPADDR1 , MS_COMPADDR2 , MS_COMP_POST_YN , MS_COMPDEPT , MS_COMPPOSITION , MS_REGDAY , MS_ENDDAY , MS_REMARK , MS_MKT_AGREE_YN , MS_DORMANT , LOGIN_TIME , MS_DI , MS_AREA1 , MS_AREA1 , A.INPUT_STAFF , A.INPUT_DATETIME , A.INPUT_IP , A.UPDATE_STAFF , A.UPDATE_DATETIME , A.UPDATE_IP , B.MS_IMG_PATH , B.MS_IMG_NAME , C.LIC_NAME , MS_ORDER FROM DR_MS_MAININFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN DR_MS_PICTURE B ON A.MS_NUM = B.MS_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MS_NUM , BB.CD_TITLE1 AS LIC_NAME , MIN(AA.LIC_SEQ) FROM PRO_LICENSE AA LEFT OUTER JOIN CD_COMMON BB ON BB.CD_CODE = AA.LIC_KIND AND BB.CD_DIVISION = '018' WHERE LIC_OPEN_YN != 'N' GROUP BY MS_NUM ) C ON A.MS_NUM = C.MS_NUM WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.MS_DIVISION = '00' AND A.MS_LEVEL = '00' AND IFNULL(NULLIF(A.MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(NULLIF(A.MS_DORMANT,''),'N') = 'N' AND A.MS_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CAST(IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_ORDER,''),'999') AS UNSIGNED), INPUT_DATETIME

/* memberMapper.selectAmbassadorList - 앰배서더 목록 조회 (DR_MS_MAININFO) */ SELECT A.MS_NUM , MS_STATUS , MS_BK_GRANT , MS_DIVISION , MS_LEVEL , MS_LOGIN_CD , MS_LINK , MS_ID , MS_NAME , MS_ENAME , MS_NICKNAME , MS_IMAGENAME , MS_SEX , DATE_FORMAT(MS_BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MS_BIRTH , MS_BIRTHYL , MS_FIRST_PHONE1 , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_MID_PHONE1), 'YIDO') AS MS_MID_PHONE1 , MS_LAST_PHONE1 , SMS_CHK1 , MS_BLANK , MS_VOUCHER_DAY , MS_WEDDINGDAY , MS_WEDDING , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_EMAIL), 'YIDO') AS MS_EMAIL , MS_EMAIL_YN , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_HOMETEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_HOMETEL , MS_HOMEZIP , MS_HOMEADDR1 , MS_HOMEADDR2 , MS_POST_YN , MS_COMPNM , MS_COMPNO , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPTEL), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPTEL , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MS_COMPFAX), 'YIDO') AS MS_COMPFAX , MS_COMPZIP , MS_COMPADDR1 , MS_COMPADDR2 , MS_COMP_POST_YN , MS_COMPDEPT , MS_COMPPOSITION , MS_REGDAY , MS_ENDDAY , MS_REMARK , MS_MKT_AGREE_YN , MS_DORMANT , LOGIN_TIME , MS_DI , MS_AREA1 , MS_AREA2 , A.INPUT_STAFF , A.INPUT_DATETIME , A.INPUT_IP , A.UPDATE_STAFF , A.UPDATE_DATETIME , A.UPDATE_IP , B.MS_IMG_PATH , B.MS_IMG_NAME , C.LIC_NAME , MS_ORDER FROM DR_MS_MAININFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN DR_MS_PICTURE B ON A.MS_NUM = B.MS_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MS_NUM , BB.CD_TITLE1 AS LIC_NAME , MIN(AA.LIC_SEQ) FROM PRO_LICENSE AA LEFT OUTER JOIN CD_COMMON BB ON BB.CD_CODE = AA.LIC_KIND AND BB.CD_DIVISION = '018' WHERE LIC_OPEN_YN != 'N' GROUP BY MS_NUM ) C ON A.MS_NUM = C.MS_NUM WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.MS_DIVISION = '00' AND A.MS_LEVEL = '02' AND IFNULL(NULLIF(A.MS_BLANK,''),'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(NULLIF(A.MS_DORMANT,''),'N') = 'N' AND A.MS_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CAST(IFNULL(NULLIF(MS_ORDER,''),'999') AS UNSIGNED), INPUT_DATETIME
/* memberMapper.selectDrMsPicture - 회원/프로 프로필 이미지 조회 */ SELECT MS_IMG_NAME , MS_IMG_PATH FROM DR_MS_PICTURE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MS_NUM = #{msNum} LIMIT 1
